tomato.name: Tomato
tomato.description: Slightly acidic. Rich in carotene. Suited for South Indian style cooking.

onion.name: Onion
onion.description: Aids in reducing inflammation. Ideal for home cooking.

potato.name: Potato
potato.description: Uniform sandy texture, no lumps, great taste. Rich in potassium.

apple.name: Green Apples
apple.description: Rich in Vitamin A, B, and C. Shelf life - 2 days when refrigerated(2-4°C)

banana.name: Banana
banana.description: Sweet tasting and rich in Vitamin C, healthy fats, and potassium.

kiwi.name: Kiwi
kiwi.description: Tangy-sweet in taste. Shelf life - 2 days when refrigerated(2-4°C).

dal.name: Tur Dal
dal.description: Tur Dal is the most common dal found in homes. It is very nutritive.

milkmaid.name: Nestle Milkmaid
milkmaid.description: Made from double toned milk, it gives you the right taste and nutrition.

oil.name: Sunflower Oil
oil.description: Sunflower Oil is a healthy and nutritious oil. It makes you feel light.
